name: Image Comparison
author: WPDeveloper

sections.description:
Use Image Comparison plugin & let your visitors compare images to make your website interactive. If you are using WooCommerce or running any eCommerce store on WordPress, this block plugin can be super handy for you and your customers. You can easily use it from WordPress block editor and make your website interactive.

Completely Customizable: You can customize the images, size, colors, etc to make it suitable for your website design.

Super Light-weight: No extra resources used and it’s highly optimized for super fast loading & instant Live editing.

Dedicated Support: We’ve an extraordinary support team ready to help you. Ask your questions in the support forum, we’ll get back to you immediately.

🚀 BACKED BY A TRUSTED TEAM

This Block is brought to you by WPDeveloper, the team behind the most popular elements library Essential Addons for Elementor (used by almost 1 million+ happy users from 180+ countries).

👨‍💻 DOCUMENTATION AND SUPPORT

  • For documentation and tutorials go to our documentation
  • To report issue and contribution visit Github.
  • If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs and documentation, check out our website at WPDeveloper.

🙌 JOIN THE COMMUNITY

🎦 Subscribe to our Youtube Channel to watch video tutorials on WordPress.

🤝 Join our Facebook Community & get connected with expert web creators like yourself.

🧡 LOVED Image Comparison Block? Rate us on WordPress Repository

sections.installation:
Modern Way:

  1. Go to the WordPress Block/Gutenberg Editor
  2. Search For “Image Comparison”.
  3. Install in 1-click

Old Way:

  1. Upload image-comparison to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Follow the Documentation
sections.faq:
Does it work with any WordPress theme?

Yes, it will work with any standard WordPress theme.
sections.changelog:
1.3.6 – 06/12/2023

  • Fixed: script dependency issue
  • Improved: Controls

1.3.5 – 03/04/2023

  • Improved: font loader & controls

1.3.4 – 07/12/2022

  • Improved: Controls and structure
  • Fixed: Minor issues

1.3.3 – 28/08/2022

  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.3.2 – 08/06/2022

  • Hotfix: Controls file not found issue

1.3.1 – 08/06/2022

  • Added: Animation, Custom Css and responsive options
  • Improved: Controls & structure

1.3.0 – 09/02/2022

  • Fixed: Block Base theme support
  • Improved: Font Library Updated
  • Improved: Controls and structure

1.2.0 – 23/08/2021

  • Added: Responsive controls
  • Added: Margin, padding option in wrapper
  • Added: Content alignment, label alignment
  • Added: Design customisable option for label
  • Added: Advance and responsive typography option
  • Added: Responsive preview edit option

1.0.1

  • Fix: Missing css, js files

1.0.0

  • Initial Release
sections.reviews:
Nice application

By lucge on December 1, 2022

That app do exactly what I was looking for: side to side photo comparison. Works without any problem with WP6.1. Thanks to the developers who released the app to the wordpress community

They don't care about their existing users

By Jos Klever (josklever) on December 7, 2023

<!-- wp:paragraph --> <p class="">With the update to version 1.2.0 all previously created before/after sliders are broken and they refuse to fix it. They just don’t seem te care about their users.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:paragraph --> <p class="">I’ve created a support ticket to ask for a fix and even listed the steps to reproduce the issue, but they simply say that the plugin improved (so I should be happy?) and blame WordPress for this situation unjustly.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:paragraph --> <p class="">With version 1.3.5 it wasn’t possible to create new blocks, but as this plugin didn’t have priority I had to find an alternative. They tried to move me to the full plugin bundle, but that even broke the existing blocks, so that wasn’t an option either.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph --> <!-- wp:paragraph --> <p class="">Eventually the plugin was fixed after all, so we’re still using it. Only because recreating alle existing content is too much work. Because of the fix an I’ve given an extra star, but restoring the trust still needs a lot of work.</p> <!-- /wp:paragraph -->

DEPRECATED DO NOT DOWNLOAD

By thebourgeoispunk on December 9, 2020

I spent $50 to figure out this plugin was the cause for a white screen of death in the post editor. The image comparison function is included in the WPDeveloper Essential Blocks for Gutenberg plugin. This plugin should be removed from the wordpress store to eliminate confusion!

Amazing Plugin

By Bhabishya Bhatt (nepalimind) on September 24, 2020

Love the plugin !!!
